Text:
You can of course ecxept the spanish mod if you want.

If the game already has the Tutorial, you don't need  this, but if you install this there is nothing more from that it will simple replace the file.

There is a second updated reupload for all the game, you better choose this: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7529505
"Imperium III - Great Battles of Rome - English Translation PC !2ndReUp!"
